subject: Re: Brand chemistry/Axiom: Axiom pages update
preview: Hi Serena, All good, thanks for letting me know. You have an awesome break too!I'm away from 20 Dec to 20 Jan, but the team will be monitoring the support@wpperk.com desk from 6 Jan. Joel will be abl

full_threads.body:
Hi Serena, 

All good, thanks for letting me know. You have an awesome break too!

I'm away from 20 Dec to 20 Jan, but the team will be monitoring the support@wpperk.com desk from 6 Jan. Joel will be able to help you get this live : )
@heath They are pushing it next year. just a note.

HI Heath,

Thanks for getting it done so quickly!

We're pushing this out to the new year now as the client has gone on leave and we can't go any further than this. So, we'll be reviewing/reverting with feedback and going live in Jan. We're back in the office w/c Jan 6 - we'll be in touch then!

Thanks again for turning this around so quickly - and have a wonderful break! ☺

Cheers,
Serena

Serena Chuan
Head of Digital
0416 362 621

Brand chemistry
brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Laura,

Sure, confirming we have updated the text changes on the following pages.
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/axiom-home-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-impact-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-work-v2/

Let me know if this ok?

@heath 
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/axiom-home-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-impact-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-work-v2/

Hi Heath,

I hope you are well?

Please find the revised copy changes to go above the forms on the Home, Why Axiom and Case Study pages in the word document here.

If you can please action these text changes?

Please let me know if you have any questions :)

Many thanks,

Laura
Great, thanks Serena : )

Hi Heath,

Hope you've had a good weeknd!

Just a quick update - the pages are with the client at the moment - we aim to get all feedback to you tomorrow.

Thanks!
Serena

Serena Chuan
Head of Digital
0416 362 621

Brand chemistry
brandchemistry.com.au

Thanks Heath - we'll send this to the client tomorrow for their review, and we'll get back to you with more feedback (if any).

Watch this space! :)

Thanks,
Serena

Hi Serena, 

Ok great, thanks for getting back to me. We have sorted out the two items and will wait to hear back from you re the form : )

Hi Heath,

Thanks for this!

We've added in the feedback into the Doc - all homepage related - the other pages look good!

There are 3 things flagged for the homepage, 2 of which can be reviewed now. Re form, I'd just like to clarify internally to see if we want to make a change in form - but as my colleagues are in client meetings at the moment, I'll try to get the feedback to you by COB today, if not early tomorrow.

Thanks Heath - please let me know if you have any questions about the other two flagged items!

Thanks,
Serena

Cool thanks Serena, 

Confirming we have now added the McGrath image too. 

Here are the links again: 

https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/axiom-home-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-impact-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-work-v2/

Hi Heath,

We've received the last pending image from the client - for McGrath, and it's in the same folder - called McGrath-Hi-res.jpg.

We'll review the whole lot in one go. :) Thanks! Pls let us know if you have any questions!

Cheers,
Serena

Serena Chuan
Head of Digital
0416 362 621

Brand chemistry
brandchemistry.com.au

Hi Heath,

Thanks for this!

We'll review this and get back to you asap.

Thanks!
Serena

Hi Serena, 

Ok sure, we have now made the requested updates, including the shortened form in the footer of the temp home page. 

Here are the links for you to review: 

https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/axiom-home-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-impact-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-work-v2/

My only concern may be the white text on the https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-impact-v2/ page being a little hard to read. Once we have the final image, we will adjust it so it's a darker background and provides more contrast.

Hi Heath,

Just responded again in the Doc! Your comments triggered something and we think it's best to do it as follows... let us know if that works for you too?

2 things please…:

1. Above the fold form: Your comments triggered another thought and we think it's best to use a new form for the above the fold section you're working on now. I've added in the embed code for the new form on the left highlighted in blue.

2. Footer form: We'll have the original footer form in the footer still (code highlighted in green), but as we'd like the client to sign off on both sections in staging this week, are you okay to place the blue-above-fold form in the footer just to illustrate the point on the staging site?

Once it's been approved by the client, I'll remove the JobRole field from the footer form in HubSpot and you can place the original code back in.

I hope that makes sense! And also not be too much of a hassle….

Thanks Heath!

Cheers,

Serena

Hey Serena, 

Haha ok cool. Yes please remove we are in their now and will fix, its impact will be minimal, we may just need to 'nudge the form' to the right a smidge.

Hi Heath,

Good timing! Just responded in the Google Doc:

Good question and yes, the form is currently used in the footer of the live site. Is that the only place you're referring to?

We aim to remove the JOB ROLE field from that form but have yet to do that - and I'd like to check with you if that'll impact the footer section layout or anything if we remove that field in the HubSpot backend now?

Thanks!
Serena

Hi Serena, 

Hope you are having a good week. 

With regards to the request: "1a. Homepage newsletter subscribe (above the fold)" - are you able to create this form in HubSpot, as the current one also has a 'Job role' field. Or, we can use this same form with the 'Job role field if preferred. Let me know?
You need to be logged in for you to check the pages.

@heath I have created a duplicate page on the live site and put it on private. let me know if this works for you? 

https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/axiom-home-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-impact-v2/
https://axiomworkplaces.com.au/our-work-v2/

fyi, I have added some comments on the word doc. 

Hi, 

Regarding “1a. Homepage newsletter subscribe (above the fold)” the hubspot form script given here is currently in use on the live site. Do you want us to create a new form or update the existing one? 

Currently we don’t have access on the hubspot account.
@joel perhaps we just duplicate the relevant pages and work on them there. Once the client approves we can copy and paste over to the pages. Thanks!

Thanks Serena, yes timeframes will be fine. 

I'll let you know if we need anything else : )
